no increase s k to end slipping markers as you reach them round 4 k to end slipping markers as you reach them repeat rnds 1-4 1 0 0 0 x x x x x x more times www elizabethsmithknits com 3 underarm divide waist shaping section 1 total sts before start of underarm divide round 1 - decrease round #1 *k1 ssk k to 3 sts before front/back 58 62 64 68 72 74 78 80 84 88 marker k2tog k1 sm repeat from * 1 more time 4 sts decrease d 2 sts each front/back each sleeve 38 40 42 41 43 43 46 48 48 48 rnds 2-16 work in st st for 15 rnds next round broken down into steps below round 17 - decrease round #2 *k1 ssk k to 3 sts before step 1 *k across back to marker remove marker marker k2tog k1 sm repeat from * 1 more time 4 transfer next 38 40 42 41 43 43 46 48 48 48 sts decrease d 2 sts each front/back -
